scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:express && npm run build:nest
scripts.build:lib: npm run build:lib:common && npm run build:lib:client && npm run build:lib:express && npm run build:lib:nest
scripts.build:express: npm run build:express:common && npm run build:express:client && npm run build:express:server
scripts.build:nest: npm run build:nest:common && npm run build:nest:client && npm run build:nest:server
scripts.clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:express && npm run clean:nest
scripts.clean:lib: npm run clean:lib:common && npm run clean:lib:client && npm run clean:lib:express && npm run clean:lib:nest
scripts.clean:express: npm run clean:express:common && npm run clean:express:client && npm run clean:express:server
scripts.clean:nest: npm run clean:nest:common && npm run clean:nest:client && npm run clean:nest:server
scripts.dev: npm run build:lib && concurrently --kill-others 'npm run dev:lib' 'sleep 5; npm run dev:express' 'sleep 5; npm run dev:nest'
scripts.dev:lib: npm run build:lib:common && concurrently --kill-others 'npm run dev:lib:client' 'npm run dev:lib:common' 'npm run dev:lib:express' 'npm run dev:lib:nest'
scripts.dev:express: concurrently --kill-others 'npm run dev:express:common' 'sleep 5; npm run dev:express:client' 'sleep 5; npm run dev:express:server'
scripts.dev:nest: concurrently --kill-others 'npm run dev:nest:common' 'sleep 5; npm run dev:nest:client' 'sleep 5; npm run dev:nest:server'
scripts.test:lib: npm run test:lib:common && npm run test:lib:client && npm run test:lib:express && npm run test:lib:nest
